Stem: Branched, spreading, ribbed, and with very short hairs.
Leaves: Light green, mostly alternate along stem, but upper leaves can be opposite. Some hairs on edges and veins. Egg shaped with wavy edges. Often curled inwards.
Flowers: Pale yellow, bell-shaped 3 cm diameter, with 5 fused petals.
FruitSeeds: Orange coloured globular berry up to 1.5 cm diameter in bladder like case. 51-74 seeds per berry.
Impacts: Unpalatable for stock, outcompetes crop species.
